item.title: React App GitHub 페이지 배포하기
item.description: 1. package.json 파일 하단에 “hompage”:“http://깃헙주소/저장소” 추가 -package.json- ... "browserslist": { "production": [ ">0.2%", "not dead", "not op_mini all" ], "development": [ "last 1 chrome version", "last 1 firefox version", "last 1 safari version" ] }, "homepage": "https://BongHoonKo.github.io/ReactApp_K" 2. yarn add –dev gh-pages -cmd- > yarn add --dev gh-pages 3. “predeploy”:“yarn build” , “deploy”:“gh-pages -d build” 추가 -package.json- ... "scripts": { "start": "react-scripts start", "build": "react-scripts build", "test": "react-scripts test", "eject": "react-scripts eject", "predeploy": "yarn build", "deploy": "gh-pages -d build" },
